name: Monster Mash (itch) (Eriction, Wallkick, Talan0, SecretReptoid, Nwilly, Michael Fiorentino)
name_original: Monster Mash (itch) (Eriction, Wallkick, Talan0, SecretReptoid, Nwilly, Michael Fiorentino)
description:
A game made as part of the GMTK 2022 game jam - https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022

Theme: Roll of the dice

Roll through random creature parts to make your perfect monster! Then do your best to match the demands of the very judgemental crowd. Some limbs and combos score higher in cuteness; some score higher in strength. The only thing between you and the most optimal monster is pure luck!
